channel.title: Kobe on Misa's Odekake Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kobe on Misa's Odekake Blog

item.title: Yuge Farm
item.description: I went to the Yuge Farm in the northern Kobe. We can see cows closely in the farm. When I visited, there was a baby cow which was born a week before. I was surprised that he was great in size in spite of being only one week old. Then, the milk there was very very delicious! It was quite different from the one in grocery stores. Besides, different from

item.title: Cafe Poko no Mori, a cafe where you can meet birds
item.description: “Torimi” means bird watching. We can meet many kinds of small birds. It is near Oji Zoo. We went there after visiting the zoo. Touching birds wasn’t allowed in this cafe, unlike other bird cafes. However, through the glass, birds came near me! My favorite type of birds is cockatiels, but he was very active and restless, so it was difficult to take pictures. Both drinks and sweets were related
